dublin_core.dcvalue: Recent rapid growth in mobile computing technologies enables telemedicine applications to operate on mobile devices Our focus is on the design of an integrated electrocardiogram ECG beat detector on a Personal Digital Assistant PDA platform for the health screening process The ECG beat detector module will be supported by the PDA version of Personal Health Information Management System PHIMS and Facilitated Accurate Referral Management System FARMS through wireless network infrastructure as a home based mobile cardiac monitoring solution
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
A PDA-Based ECG Beat Detector for Home Cardiac Care.
